thread.title: Morristown & Erie Railway Partners with ShipXpress
thread.title_full: Morristown & Erie Railway Partners with ShipXpress - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Morristown & Erie Railway Partners with ShipXpress
text:
ShipXpress enabled real-time access of operational and revenue information across all properties of Morristown & Erie Railway. The new solution provides a much better view of trips, data, and daily operating processes to operations managers, train crews, and customers - who are now finding it extremely easy to access new and important information from all railroads.
NEPTUNE BEACH, FL (PRWEB) October 12, 2015
ShipXpress Inc., a leading provider of cloud-based software solutions for the logistics industry, announced that the Morristown & Erie Railway (M&E) has chosen the RailSync® product suite to manage its railway logistics.
Since 1895, the Morristown & Erie Railway has been providing freight transportation services to Morris, Essex, and Union Counties in Northern New Jersey. They move commodities such as lumber, plastic, food products, and chemicals throughout North America in collaboration with other national freight carriers. M&E also provides rail services to the mid-coast of Maine as the Maine Eastern Railroad, and performs in-plant switching at the Bayway Refinery which is the second largest oil refinery in the East Coast.
“M&E did not have visibility across their properties because their previous solution had each of their railroads in a separate database. Being a true SAAS single instance solution, we enabled real-time access of operational and revenue information across all properties. M&E’s management can make timely decisions with complete access to all this information even via mobile devices,” said Charith Perera.
“The transition to the ShipXpress solution was smooth and their customer service was impeccable. The new solution provides us with a much better view of trips, data, and daily operating processes as our operations managers, train crews, and customers are finding it extremely easy to access new and important information from all of our railroads. We now have all of our properties using one system that tracks our revenues and operating expenses at a corporate level, which allows us to better monitor cash flows and make more cost-effective decisions. Another addition in the system that helped us improve our car hire payables process was the ability to see our liability on a daily basis,” said Chuck Jensen, VP & Chief Operating Officer of M&E.
About ShipXpress Inc.
ShipXpress is a leading provider of cloud-based software solutions, enabling industrial and commodities businesses to efficiently operate and collaborate with their supply chain partners. North American railroads and Fortune 500 companies in the energy, agriculture, chemical, and metal industries rely on ShipXpress to deliver customized supply chain solutions. We provide collaborative software systems to help businesses of all types and sizes manage data, simplify manual processes, and improve business analysis and administrative tasks. ShipXpress Inc. is based in Neptune Beach, Florida; for more information on the company, its solutions, and its team, please visit http://www.shipxpress.com .
About RailSync®
RailSync® is designed exclusively to address the requirements of short line and regional railroads. It is a comprehensive transportation management system which efficiently monitors local and interline rail activity while providing complete control over customer service administration and management of several key railroad functionalities. RailSync is a SaaS platform system which has an accompanying mobile application at no additional cost; Mobile Command can be accessed remotely from all iOS and Android smartphones. RailSync® provides real-time access which enables users to minimize training time and product implementation efforts with an easy-to-use, robust interface with 24/7 live customer support.
